snippet: Ms. Washington-Williams lived for decades with a stunning secret — that she was the interracial daughter of Senator Strom Thurmond of South Carolina, who never publicly acknowledged her as his child.
abstract: Essie Mae Washington-Williams, who lived for decades with secret that she was interracial daughter of Sen Strom Thurmond, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Washington-Williams lived for decades with a stunning secret — that she was the interracial daughter of Senator Strom Thurmond of South Carolina, who never publicly acknowledged her as his child.

headline.seo: Essie Mae Washington-Williams, Secret Child of Famous Father, Dies at 87
headline.main: Essie Mae Washington-Williams, Child of Famous but Secret Father, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Essie Mae Washington-Williams, Child Of Famous but Secret Father, Dies at 87
